Type.Name: FinishClickedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FinishClickedHandler(object o, FinishClickedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed FinishClickedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the FinishClickedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the FinishClickedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the FinishClickedHandler is removed from the event.
